title.heading: The New Start
title.subheading: Now that you are filled with the Holy Spirit:

panel.text: - To glorify Christ with your life. (John 16:14)
- To grow in your understanding of God and His Word. (1 Corinthians 2:14,15)
- To live a life pleasing to God. (Galatians 5:16-23)
"But you will receive power when the Holy Spirit comes on you; and you will be my witnesses in Jerusalem, and in all Judea and Samaria, and to the ends of the earth" (Acts 1:8)"
